flow-definition.description: ENM Cloud Native Backup Build pipeline cENM_Backup - autogenerated using JobDSL - all manual changes will be overwritten!

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: deployment_mechanism
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: This parameter acts as the flow controller to select the deployment mechanism either charts or csar.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: environment_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The deployment name to run the job against

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: stage_area
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: This parameter acts as the flow controller to download charts from internal area or release area

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: product_set_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide clould native product set version of existing deployment on environment to take backup

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: backup_scope
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: This parameter acts as the flow controller to select the scope of backup
